resources.string: Will ​Byers, ​of ​a ​small ​town ​named ​Indiana ​got ​teleported ​to ​a ​different dimension, ​the ​“Upside ​Down”. ​His ​friends, ​family ​and ​other ​acquaintances somehow ​managed ​to ​rescue ​him ​back ​from ​the ​upside ​down ​but ​along ​with him ​they ​also ​brought ​the ​horrific ​memories ​of ​the ​so ​called ​“Demogorgon” which ​kept ​haunting ​him ​for ​long. This app keeps track of all the visions Will has of the other world and bring him back each ​time ​he ​has ​one ​of ​his visions.
Warning : This may lead to huge data loss permanently
However, you will still be able to keep track of rescues of all characters.
